xt:extension.xt:author: Eliot Kimber
xt:extension.xt:name: Oxygen DITA Collection Framework
xt:extension.xt:description: OxygenXML framework for making Saxon collections from DITA maps to make it easy to operate on the files in a map using XQuery.
xt:extension.xt:license: May be used for any purpose.

xt:extension.xt:author: Eliot Kimber
xt:extension.xt:name: Oxygen DITA Collection Framework
xt:extension.xt:description:
OxygenXML framework for making Saxon collections from DITA maps to make it easy to operate on the files in a map using XQuery.
Release 0.1.1 fixes bug that causes XSLT failure under some conditions.
xt:extension.xt:license: May be used for any purpose.
